text:
1. Vicky Kaushal Tells Fans ‘Aapke Josh Ko Salaam’ As Uri Makes A Double Century At The Box Office
Vicky Kaushal starrer Uri: The Surgical Strike is unstoppable. It is officially a blockbuster now. The movie has crossed Rs. 200 crore mark at the box office.
2. Online To Real Life! Girl Trolls Hardik Pandya With ‘Aaj Karke Aaya Kya?’ Banner During Match
Is she is a Fan or Hater of Pandya ? pic.twitter.com/P3vGD7rSXV — Tanitalks (@Tanitalks1) February 8, 2019
At T20 international between India and New Zealand on Feb 8, a girl trolled Hardik Pandya by holding a banner that read, “Pandya Aaj Karke Aaya Kya?”
3. Unlike The Wink, Priya Varrier's Kissing Scene Gets Trolled, Gets More Dislikes Than Likes!
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
A few days ago, another video from the movie was released that grabbed many eyeballs yet again. This time Priya Prakash Varrier was seen kissing her co-star Abdul Rauf. However, unlike her last video, this one is getting brutally trolled on social media.
4. From Skirts To Street-Style, Ranveer Singh Couldn't Care Any Less About The Fashion Police!
Ranveer Singh has taken his fashion game a notch higher especially during the promotions of his forthcoming film Gully Boy. Just like how the film gives us a crazy and energetic vibe, Ranveer Singh is also trying to reflect the same through his outfits. He even called himself “faalooda” mocking his own fashion choice.
5. Alia Bhatt Has A Habit Of Wanting To Be Correct All The Time & She Finds It Really Irritating
Alia shared how much she enjoyed playing Safeena's character in Gully Boy because she is not at all like the character in real life. However, she wished she could be a little like her, "I am a vary hoity toity, a Juhuite, but when I was in my character of Safeena , I pretty much enjoyed it because at the end of the day I am a Mumbaikar and that taporigiri is there in me and I am very proud of it."
title: Hardik Pandya Gets Trolled Again, Uri Crosses Rs 200 Crore & More From Entertainment
description: Hardik Pandya made a lot of objectionable comments on Koffee With Karan. The chat show indeed changed his life. It has almost been a month since the episode aired, but there seems to be no end to the trouble that Hardik Pandya and KL Rahul are facing. What happened on the show will haunt him forever, it seems.
